li.p: Using the Learning Hub parents and students will be able to view weekly learning schedules, contact teachers, access Google Classroom, and explore educational content and resources.

img.alt: Huron Board Office and High School
img.title: Huron Board Office and High School

div.p: Our vision is to inspire personal growth in every student and to ignite a passion for learning and leadership. For information pertaining to events at each building, please click on their individual sites for detailed information.

div.style: box-shadow: 0px 5px 10px grey; width: 75%; background: white; border: 2px solid black; padding: 10px; margin: 20px auto 20px auto;

p.style: text-decoration: underline; margin-bottom: 20px; line-height: 36px; font-weight: bold; font-size: 36px; margin: 0px; text-align: center;

div.style: color: white; background: black; padding: 20px; text-align: center;

p.span: Thank you Huron family and community members for your support!

a.title: Bond Proposal Letter of Thanks
a.span: Read a letter of thanks from the superintendent and view updates regarding the bond.

div.p: Huron School District is a great place for learning. The Huron Township community is one of the last rural areas existing in Wayne County, Michigan. Huron Schools embraces small town values; while providing students with big time educational opportunities. Because of the excellent educational setting, highly desirable schools and outstanding employees, Huron Schools are the “Schools of Choice” in the downriver region.

a.title: About Huron School District
a.span: Learn more about Huron School District.

div.p: A list of events/calendar for the 2019-2020 School year is now available on the district's calendar page. Events will also be posted directly to the district's calendar and available in upcoming events. The print calendar and a PDF of version will be available prior to the start of the school year.

p.style: font-weight: bold; text-align: center; font-size: 24px; line-height: 36px; margin-bottom: 0;
